Package spring2024.cs472.hotelwebsite.services

Class AccountService

java.lang.Object
spring2024.cs472.hotelwebsite.services.AccountService
@Service public class AccountService extends Object
Service class for managing accounts. This class provides methods for managing user accounts, such as retrieving all accounts, validating login credentials, saving and deleting accounts, sending password reset emails, generating password reset tokens, checking if a token has expired, and sending confirmation emails. It also provides a method for getting an account by its ID.
Author:
Team ABCFG

      public String sendEmail(Account account)
      Sends a password reset email.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      "Success" if email sent successfully, "error" otherwise.

    • hasExpired

      public boolean hasExpired(LocalDateTime expiryDateTime)
      Checks if a token has expired.
      Parameters:
      expiryDateTime - The expiry date and time of the token.
      Returns:
      true if the token has not expired, false otherwise.

    • sendConfirmationEmail

      public boolean sendConfirmationEmail(Account account, ReservationDetails details)
      Sends a confirmation email for a reservation.
      Parameters:
      account - The account to which to send the email.
      details - The reservation details.
      Returns:
      true if email sent successfully, false otherwise.
